projectGridLines.title: Digital Twin of the Heart
projectGridLines.description:
Description: We envisage a Digital Twin, a personalized computational model of a patientâ€™s heart,

Twin brings all the relevant patient data and the AI will model with other adjunct data, say lab reports,

imaging data, and medication. We propose to create digital patient model, which can create, visualize,

and test simulations of future state of health and potential diagnostic steps and therapies.

Skill sets: Python, Data Structures, AI/ML, LabVIEW / MATLAB (Simulink), Exposure to GPU for

Acceleration

Traits expectation: Research Aptitude, Problem Solving, Working with Abstraction

Expected learning: Systems Understanding, AI (Theory) to Application

Specific courses required for project execution:

? Python,

? AI/ML,

? Usage of LabVIEW/Simulink,

? Image Processing.

Team Composition: 2 Computer Science/Medical Devices/ECE/Electrical Engg.
